com.github.hotware.lucene.extension.highlight

Interface ObjectFragmentsBuilder

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseObjectFragmentsBuilder, ScoreOrderObjectFragmentsBuilder

    public interface ObjectFragmentsBuilder

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> List<T> createFragments(org.apache.lucene.index.IndexReader reader, int docId, String fieldName, org.apache.lucene.search.vectorhighlight.FieldFragList fieldFragList, int maxNumFragments, ObjectEncoder<T> encoder)
      create multiple fragments.

    • Method Detail

      • createFragments

        <T> List<T> createFragments(org.apache.lucene.index.IndexReader reader,
                            int docId,
                            String fieldName,
                            org.apache.lucene.search.vectorhighlight.FieldFragList fieldFragList,
                            int maxNumFragments,
                            ObjectEncoder<T> encoder)
                     throws IOException
        create multiple fragments.
        Parameters:
        reader - IndexReader of the index
        docId - document id to be highlighter
        fieldName - field of the document to be highlighted
        fieldFragList - FieldFragList object
        maxNumFragments - maximum number of fragments
        preTags - pre-tags to be used to highlight terms
        postTags - post-tags to be used to highlight terms
        encoder - an encoder that generates encoded text
        Returns:
        created fragments or null when no fragments created. size of the array can be less than maxNumFragments
        Throws:
        IOException - If there is a low-level I/O error
